main event: A civilian observed a metallic gray object flashing on and off in Roslyn Heights, New York on 27 May 1966.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 2 minutes and 30 seconds., The object was described as metallic gray., The object flashed on and off during the observation., The report concluded that there was insufficient data for evaluation., No photographs or physical evidence were obtained.
witness description: A civilian who appeared to be intelligent and replied to questions quickly.
